summary: Utility functions that centralize the execution of Lightning trainer lifecycle hooks, callbacks, and strategy interactions while handling interrupts and signal management. They provide a consistent way to invoke model configuration, data module hooks, checkpoint loading/saving, and teardown procedures within the PyTorch Lightning training loop.
business_intent: To ensure reliable and orderly execution of training, validation, and testing phases by coordinating callbacks, checkpoint management, and strategy-specific operations, while gracefully handling user interruptions and system signals during the training process.
